title: SessionStart Hook Output Schema
description: Output schema for the SessionStart hook event. SessionStart cannot block session start; it is used for injecting startup context into Claude's context window via hookSpecificOutput.additionalContext. Plain text stdout is also added as context visible to Claude.

hookSpecificOutput.description: Event-specific output for SessionStart. Used to inject context into Claude's context window.

additionalContext.description: Context string added to Claude's context window. Values from multiple hooks are concatenated.
